title: Bored Uber Driver on a Tuesday Afternoon

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: > During the day, secretly add 3 votes to someone.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> If you are in the game, all executions are instead instances of people being ran over.
> You may only use your extra votes after the first time someone is ran over.
> Your extra votes can hammer people.
> At the start of the game, you may choose to have no defense instead of basic defense. If you choose to have no defense, the day after you die nobody may be executed as the town needs to find a new way of executing people.
Win Con:
> Have the good faction lose the game. (This can win while dead).
